column9: Donor: All-Party Parliamentary China Group (with sponsorship from Arup, Cambridge Assessment, City of London, GKN, HSBC, John Swire & Sons)Address of donor: All Party Parliamentary China Group, House of CommonsAmount of donation (or estimate of the probable value): (1) flights with a value of £1,302 (2) hotel accommodation, transport and meals with a value of £757.49; £2,059.49 in total Destination of visit: China
